summary: Hercule Poirot is a famous fictional detective from books written by Agatha Christie. He is a Belgian character who solves mysteries and appears in many novels, plays, and short stories. The stories started in 1920 and continued for over 50 years. Poirot has been brought to life by many actors in radio, movies, and TV shows. He is known for his cleverness and unique style, making him one of the most popular characters in crime fiction.
title: Hercule Poirot
